title: Do i have to buy last years snowdown emotes again?
body:
Last year the snowdown jinglebell, poro eating a cookie and sad amumu emote were included if you boughts enough chests and got the icons. Do i have to buy those 3 emotes again this year when they are released? Or do you get them if you had the icons last year.

[Jinglebell emote](https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wGxYGckVkWo/WhM12MNL7cI/AAAAAAAAzyo/uMQnszeDLu03vUj7ZBsCig6tJ_oaYCg0QCLcBGAs/s1600/7aed02b8120c9a0d.png)
[poro eating cookie emote](https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KH-7w9q6db8/WhM13Pi50FI/AAAAAAAAzyw/wcH7iT0WPuIruUk4LAa6JBA4cGwzLH9twCLcBGAs/s1600/878baab6f475d710.png)
[sad amumu emote](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PNi-JA0QKrE/WhM13pM1nlI/AAAAAAAAzy0/RATdUnAh_Qo1TYwGwVhOP5dXU6aq83a_wCLcBGAs/s1600/976c7e067f6b3b48.png)

replies.body: I'm not sure about any snowdown content at this moment, but if you already unlocked content it wouldn't make sense to have to obtain them again.  Keep an eye out on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page should anything come up!
No you don't have to buy or earn them again, I have my jingle bell emote now~! Happy I put in the work for it haha.
